text: Ani jevha tumhi mhanale, he musa! Amhala ekaca prakaracya jevanane dhira-sanyama rakhala janara nahi, yastava apalya palanakartyajavala du'a-prarthana kara ki tyane amhala jaminituna utpanna jhaleli bhaji, kakadi, gahu, masura ani kanda dyava. Musa mhanale ki uttama vastumaivaji tuccha vastu ka magata? Maga tara ekhadya saharata ja, tithe tumhala tumacya pasanticya ya sarva cija-vastu milatila. Tyancyavara apamana ani durdasa takali geli ani te allahaca azaba (prakopa) ghe'una paratale. He asasathi ki te allahacya ayatinna manata navhate, ani paigambaranci nahaka hatya karita hote. Tyancya juluma atirekaca ha parinama hoya
